trans-unit.source: A class that serializes a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance to and from RSS 2.0 format.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于在 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 实例与 RSS 2.0 格式之间来回序列化的类。

trans-unit.source: Use this class to serialize instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and to create instances of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> from XML documents that represent RSS 2.0 feeds.
trans-unit.target: 使用此类可以序列化 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 的实例，以及从表示 RSS 2.0 源的 XML 文档创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: If you have derived a class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and want to serialize it, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter%601> formatter.
trans-unit.target: 如果想要序列化从 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 派生的类，请使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter%601> 格式化程序。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> and serialize it to RSS 2.0.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 并将其序列化为 RSS 2.0。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance and read in an RSS syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> 实例并读入 RSS 联合源。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> 实例创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The instance derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的派生自 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to specify a class derived from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> to instantiate when a syndication feed is read in.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数可以指定要在读入联合源时实例化的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 派生类。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to serialize.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to serialize elements that are defined in the Atom 1.0 specification but not in the RSS 2.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指定是否对在 Atom 1.0 规范中已定义但在 RSS 2.0 规范中未定义的元素进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> 实例创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If the `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` parameter is `true`, all elements defined in the Atom 1.0 specification that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification are serialized with in the Atom 1.0 namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果 `serializeExtensionsAsAtom` 参数为 `true`，则会用 Atom 1.0 命名空间对在 Atom 1.0 规范中已定义但在 RSS 2.0 规范中未定义的所有元素进行序列化。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to call this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其中进行读取的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid RSS 2.0 syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: 验证指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 是否包含有效的 RSS 2.0 联合源。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid RSS 2.0 syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指定 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 是否包含有效的 RSS 2.0 联合源。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.CanRead%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.CanRead%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" />。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The instance derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 派生自与 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 实例关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: The instance derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 派生自与 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 实例关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> 的实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置一个值，该值指定是否在序列化过程中保留属性扩展。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to preserve attribute extensions during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定是否在序列化过程中保留属性扩展的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Attribute extensions are XML attributes that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: 属性扩展是 RSS 2.0 规范中未定义的 XML 属性。

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether to write these attributes during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此属性 (Property) 确定是否在序列化过程中写入这些属性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown attributes inside the `AttributeExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 feed.
trans-unit.target: 同样，此属性 (Property) 也确定是否在反序列化 RSS 2.0 源时保留 `AttributeExtensions` 实例中 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 属性 (Property) 内的未知属性 (Attribute)。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置一个值，该值指定是否在序列化过程中保留元素扩展。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to preserve element extensions during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定是否在序列化过程中保留元素扩展的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: Element extensions are XML elements that are not defined in the RSS 2.0 specification.
trans-unit.target: 元素扩展是 RSS 2.0 规范中未定义的 XML 元素。

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether to write these elements during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定是否在序列化过程中写入这些元素。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, this property determines whether to preserve unknown elements inside the `ElementExtensions` properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> instance when deserializing an RSS 2.0 feed.
trans-unit.target: 同样，此属性也确定是否在反序列化 RSS 2.0 源时保留 `ElementExtensions` 实例中 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 属性内的未知元素。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其中进行读取的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads an RSS 2.0 syndication feed from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实例读取 RSS 2.0 联合源。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其中进行读取的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> used to create the new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" />。

trans-unit.source: Reads a syndication item from <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance using the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实例从 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 实例读取联合项。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance is not added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 实例未添加到与 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 实例关联的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> 中。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其中进行读取的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance to use to create the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: 要用于创建 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether all of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances have been read from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定是否已从 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 实例读取所有 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Reads in a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 读入 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> 实例的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 实例的集合。

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instances are not added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> instance.
trans-unit.target: 新创建的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 实例未添加到与 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 实例关联的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter>。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.
trans-unit.target: 获取和设置一个值，该值指定是否在 Atom 1.0 命名空间中序列化扩展。

trans-unit.source: A value that specifies whether to serialize extensions within the Atom 1.0 namespace.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定是否在 Atom 1.0 命名空间中序列化扩展的值。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值为 `true`。

trans-unit.source: When this property is `true`, any properties in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> class that cannot be represented in the RSS 2.0 format are serialized within the Atom 1.0 namespace otherwise these properties are not serialized.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性为 `true` 时，会在 Atom 1.0 命名空间中序列化 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed> 类中不能以 RSS 2.0 格式表示的任何属性，否则，不会序列化这些属性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: 要与 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />。

trans-unit.source: Sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> instance associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置与 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Null" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to return your own schema.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法可以返回您自己的架构。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其中进行读取的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其中进行写入的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Implements the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 实现 <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the syndication version used by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 获取格式化程序使用的联合版本。

trans-unit.source: The syndication version used by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 格式化程序使用的联合版本。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] supports Atom 1.0 and RSS 2.0 syndication versions.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 支持 Atom 1.0 和 RSS 2.0 联合版本。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其中进行写入的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" />。

trans-unit.source: The base URI for the feed.
trans-unit.target: 源的基 URI。

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 实例写入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to change the way a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> is written.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法可以更改写入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 的方式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其中进行写入的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances to write.
trans-unit.target: 要写入的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 实例集合。

trans-unit.source: The base URI for the feed.
trans-unit.target: 源的基 URI。

trans-unit.source: Writes a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instances to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> 实例的集合写入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Override this method to change the way a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: 重写此方法可以更改写入 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> 对象集合的方式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> to write to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其中进行写入的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Writes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将与 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationFeed" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter" /> 写入指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to create a syndication feed and use a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> to write the feed to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何创建联合源以及如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Rss20FeedFormatter> 将源写入 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>。
